thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 3 of 1159
thread.title: SkiBob

author: SkiBob
title: SkiBob
text: I "accidentally" tried to reserve a room at GSR, thinking I was on the Peppermill website *side-by-side comparison using tabs on FireFox, and GSR's reservation system balked. Peppermill's reservation system accepted the same information seamlessly, and I think Peppermll's a better casino anyway (parking, food, and I'll soon see about the hotel rooms).
